goal.en: Introduce the skill to resolve problem with computing. Let student learn the analysis of algorithms. Enhance the ability to design efficient and effective algorithms for computer.
goal.ch: 介紹以計算機解問題的技巧，使學生學習演算法的分析方法，以增進其設計兼具效率和實用性的計算機演算法。
